title: Govt to extend services tenure of COAS: Shafqat Mahmood
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jan 3 (APP):Minister for Education and Professional Training Shafqat Mahmood Friday Pakistan Tehreek-e-Insaf (PTI) government would extend the service tenure of the Chief of Army Staff (COAS) with the support of all political parties.
Talking to a private news channel, he said for the sake of national interest and countryâ€™s security opposition parties were supporting the PTI government to approve Army Act amendment Bill.
Replying to a question, he said for last three months the PTI-led government along with opposition parties were debating on Army Act. It would soon be approved from the parliament.
